unnormalised: Chai break! Gas cylinder prices got you sweating more than a plate of spicy biryani this Onam season? Turns out, Bharat Gas, Indane, and HP Gas haven't budged from their last adjustments.
normalised: Chai break! Gas cylinder prices got you sweating more than a plate of spicy biryani this Onam season? Turns out, B H A R A T Gas, Indane, and H P Gas haven't budged from their last adjustments.

unnormalised: Last we checked on August 30th, a 14.2 kg cylinder will still set you back Rs. 1103 in Delhi. Mumbai folks are paying around Rs. 1102.50, while Kolkata is slightly pricier at Rs. 1129. Chennai, as usual, tops the charts at Rs. 1118.50.
normalised: Last we checked on thirtieth August, two thousand and twenty four, a fourteen point two kilogram cylinder will still set you back rupees one thousand one hundred and three in Delhi. Mumbai folks are paying around rupees one thousand one hundred and two point five zero, while Kolkata is slightly pricier at rupees one thousand one hundred and twenty nine. Chennai, as usual, tops the charts at rupees one thousand one hundred and eighteen point five zero.

unnormalised: Don't even get us started on the 5 kg one! That's gonna cost you a pretty penny if you're a student living far from Amma's home in Kerala.
normalised: Don't even get us started on the five kilogram one! That's gonna cost you a pretty penny if you're a student living far from Amma's home in Kerala.

unnormalised: Analysts at Crisil predict a possible decrease in the coming months, but who knows? Maybe Modi ji will surprise us with a Diwali dhamaka.
normalised: Analysts at Crisil predict a possible decrease in the coming months, but who knows? Maybe Modi ji will surprise us with a Diwali dhamaka.

unnormalised: Remember those days when a cylinder lasted a whole month? Now it feels like we're changing them every week! Keep an eye out for updates, and maybe start practicing your chulha skills, just in case!
normalised: Remember those days when a cylinder lasted a whole month? Now it feels like we're changing them every week! Keep an eye out for updates, and maybe start practicing your chulha skills, just in case!
